issue.body:

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

Adguard 4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://dvdgayonline.com/movies/ノンケ限界面接-the-12th-time/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> Hi so I was visiting a website I found called gaydvdonline and I selected a video to watch which is sourcing the content directly from a second site called dood.re? And it’s telling me the publisher of the video does not allow adblockers is there anyway this could be resolved please?


3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![DE1D8BD2-52D1-44C5-8E26-CF8003F5EE88](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/124982114/226521991-577c00df-059a-47a3-a14a-b5e47b99d135.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Please try these rules:
> 
> ```
> @@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=dvdgayonline.com
> @@||dvdgayonline.com^$generichide
> ```

I know what I did wrong I add those two rules as one I resolved the issue adding them separately and now it’s working thank you!

comment.body:
Do zablokowania tych reklam konieczne jest włączenie zaawansowanej ochrony (Advanced protection), ale w tym przypadku i tak czasami reklamy nadal mogą się pojawiać.

Niestety blokery reklam na iOS (to samo dotyczy rozszerzeń do przeglądarki Safari) mają ograniczone możliwości, część reguł nie jest w ogóle obsługiwana, część może być wykonana zbyt późno i przez to wyskakujące okienka/reklamy na niektórych stronach czasami nie są blokowane.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/145664#issue-1626904420 - The problem is that extensions for Firefox and Opera cannot download/update Javascript rules.
Please add this rule:
```adblock
facebook.com,facebookwkhpilnemxj7asaniu7vnjjbiltxjqhye3mhbshg7kx5tfyd.onion#%#!function(){var b=0,d=[];new MutationObserver(function(){document.querySelectorAll("div[data-pagelet^=\"FeedUnit\"]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"feed\"] > div:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"feed\"] > span:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div span > h3 ~ div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div h3~ div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), #ssrb_feed_start + div h3 ~ div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"main\"] div[class] > #ssrb_feed_start ~ div > h3 ~ div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"]),div[role=\"main\"] div > h3 ~ div > div[class]:not([style*=\"display: none\"])").forEach(function(e){Object.keys(e).forEach(function(a){if(a.includes("__reactEvents")||a.includes("__reactProps")){a=e[a];try{if(a.children?.props?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.feedEdge?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")||a.children?.props?.children?.props?.children?.props?.feedEdge?.category?.includes("SPONSORED")){b++,e.style="display: none !important;";var f=e.querySelector("a[href][aria-label]:not([aria-hidden])");f&&(d.push(["Ad blocked based on property ["+b+"] -> "+f.ariaLabel]),console.table(d))}}catch(a){}}})})}).observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0})}();
```
to user rules.

Or you can install AdGuard Extra - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra
It also should blocks sponsored posts.

<hr>

issue.title: GoatRAT Trojan block request
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

GoatRAT was originally created as an Android Remote Administration Tool to seize control of a victim’s device. However, a new version of GoatRAT functions as a Banking Trojan, specifically aimed at Brazilian banks.

Like other types of Banking Trojans, GoatRAT utilizes the Accessibility service to implement an Automatic Transfer System (ATS) framework, which enables the transfer of money from the victim’s account using the PIX key. The PIX key is used to perform the instant payment. This malware currently targets three Brazilian banks: NUBank, Banco Inter, and PagBank.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40774281/226697704-8d3874d2-43e6-4dbb-a8bb-5796352dccbf.png)

URL source: https://blog.cyble.com/2023/03/14/goatrat-android-banking-trojan-variant-targeting-brazilian-banks/

### Proposed solution

Block URL's:
<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

URL | Description
-- | -- 
hxxps://bit[.]ly/nubankmodulo | Shortened malware distribution URL
hxxps://goatrat[.]com/apks/apk20.apk | Malware distribution URL
hxxp://api.goatrat[.]com:3008 | C&C server to receive PIX key

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
I propose:
```
||goatrat.com^$all
||bit.ly/nubankmodulo^$all
```

issue.title: GoatRAT Trojan block request
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

GoatRAT was originally created as an Android Remote Administration Tool to seize control of a victim’s device. However, a new version of GoatRAT functions as a Banking Trojan, specifically aimed at Brazilian banks.

Like other types of Banking Trojans, GoatRAT utilizes the Accessibility service to implement an Automatic Transfer System (ATS) framework, which enables the transfer of money from the victim’s account using the PIX key. The PIX key is used to perform the instant payment. This malware currently targets three Brazilian banks: NUBank, Banco Inter, and PagBank.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40774281/226697704-8d3874d2-43e6-4dbb-a8bb-5796352dccbf.png)

URL source: https://blog.cyble.com/2023/03/14/goatrat-android-banking-trojan-variant-targeting-brazilian-banks/

### Proposed solution

Block URL's:
<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

URL | Description
-- | -- 
hxxps://bit[.]ly/nubankmodulo | Shortened malware distribution URL
hxxps://goatrat[.]com/apks/apk20.apk | Malware distribution URL
hxxp://api.goatrat[.]com:3008 | C&C server to receive PIX key

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
I presume the duplicate IPs can be skipped, but the rest I agree with.

AdGuard Home has been able to block by IP for some years now. I can only vaguely presume that AdGuard DNS IO (as opposed to AdGuard Public DNS) does the same.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Literature/DisneyFairies](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftvtropes.org%2Fpmwiki%2Fpmwiki.php%2FLiterature%2FDisneyFairies) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > Fairly large placeholders on the right. It doesn't seem at the time of writing like https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/15123 will be fixed anytime soon, so I'm submitting it to you guys too since it's a pretty popular website. > > I propose `##.sb-fad-unit`, though I suspect the site devs have adopted the "fad/bad/tad" element naming pattern to bypass adblockers. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Qp5VxZ9.png)

comment.body:
I find several results with `.customScrollBar > div[class] > div:first-child i[data-icon-name]`, but all for legit Emails. No result in the Ad Banner. Also `outlook.live.com#?#div[tabindex="-1"][role][data-app-section="MessageList"] > div.customScrollBar > div[class] > div:first-child:has(i[data-icon-name] + div + button)` does not fix the Banner for me.
Screenshot-1: ![out2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6276915/226869646-46d2251b-ebdb-487f-874a-4dcc5da7f80c.png)

comment.body:
Please search for the following phrase in browser's dev tool. Likely it is not hidden for you as your Outlook is in German and mine is in English:
`outlook.live.com#?#div[tabindex="-1"][role][data-app-section="MessageList"] > div.customScrollBar > div[class] > div:first-child:has(i[data-icon-name] + div + button)`


This rule should be more language independand (only one hit when I check the phrase):
.customScrollBar > div[class] > div:first-child i[data-icon-name] + div + button

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.walmart.com/account/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Faccount%2Flogin) ### Comment Username: @misc-activities > In the Walmart login page (see 0.png), I entered my email address and clicked on the Continue button. It opened a message box trying to show me a "Press and Hold" type CAPTCHA but the CAPTCHA didn't load. This can be seen in 1.png. So, I clicked on "Try a different method" in the message box. When I did that, it showed me a picture identification type CAPTCHA (see 2.png). When I completed the CAPTCHA verification, instead of asking me for the password, it went back to the page where it was asking for my email address and showed a message saying, "Something went wrong, please try again." This can be seen in 3.png. > > I closed the AdGuard app and tried and I was able to login successfully. I also tried with Stealth Mode disabled but that didn't work. > > I'm having this issue in Safari as well. ### Screenshots

issue.title: GoatRAT Trojan block request
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

GoatRAT was originally created as an Android Remote Administration Tool to seize control of a victim’s device. However, a new version of GoatRAT functions as a Banking Trojan, specifically aimed at Brazilian banks.

Like other types of Banking Trojans, GoatRAT utilizes the Accessibility service to implement an Automatic Transfer System (ATS) framework, which enables the transfer of money from the victim’s account using the PIX key. The PIX key is used to perform the instant payment. This malware currently targets three Brazilian banks: NUBank, Banco Inter, and PagBank.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40774281/226697704-8d3874d2-43e6-4dbb-a8bb-5796352dccbf.png)

URL source: https://blog.cyble.com/2023/03/14/goatrat-android-banking-trojan-variant-targeting-brazilian-banks/

### Proposed solution

Block URL's:
<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

URL | Description
-- | -- 
hxxps://bit[.]ly/nubankmodulo | Shortened malware distribution URL
hxxps://goatrat[.]com/apks/apk20.apk | Malware distribution URL
hxxp://api.goatrat[.]com:3008 | C&C server to receive PIX key

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

### Additional information

_No response_

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.walmart.com/account/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Faccount%2Flogin) ### Comment Username: @misc-activities > In the Walmart login page (see 0.png), I entered my email address and clicked on the Continue button. It opened a message box trying to show me a "Press and Hold" type CAPTCHA but the CAPTCHA didn't load. This can be seen in 1.png. So, I clicked on "Try a different method" in the message box. When I did that, it showed me a picture identification type CAPTCHA (see 2.png). When I completed the CAPTCHA verification, instead of asking me for the password, it went back to the page where it was asking for my email address and showed a message saying, "Something went wrong, please try again." This can be seen in 3.png. > > I closed the AdGuard app and tried and I was able to login successfully. issue.title: GoatRAT Trojan block request

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

GoatRAT was originally created as an Android Remote Administration Tool to seize control of a victim’s device. However, a new version of GoatRAT functions as a Banking Trojan, specifically aimed at Brazilian banks.

Like other types of Banking Trojans, GoatRAT utilizes the Accessibility service to implement an Automatic Transfer System (ATS) framework, which enables the transfer of money from the victim’s account using the PIX key. The PIX key is used to perform the instant payment. This malware currently targets three Brazilian banks: NUBank, Banco Inter, and PagBank.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40774281/226697704-8d3874d2-43e6-4dbb-a8bb-5796352dccbf.png)

URL source: https://blog.cyble.com/2023/03/14/goatrat-android-banking-trojan-variant-targeting-brazilian-banks/

### Proposed solution

Block URL's:
<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

URL | Description
-- | -- 
hxxps://bit[.]ly/nubankmodulo | Shortened malware distribution URL
hxxps://goatrat[.]com/apks/apk20.apk | Malware distribution URL
hxxp://api.goatrat[.]com:3008 | C&C server to receive PIX key

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: grabify.link
issue.body:
Hello!

**PLEASE READ THIS CAREFULLY**

I found a link cutting service that collects too much personal information.

[Here is a screenshot with proofs.](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225961924-349dda2e-029f-4194-9d7a-a5d333986dfa.jpeg)

Here is the link to this service:

https://grabify.link

Here is some screenshots to prove their domains:
[Screenshot 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225963019-4264d896-be22-47a8-9d31-2a7e68ed57e8.jpeg)
[Screenshot 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225963026-dabc08bf-3fd0-4bfc-8aab-40d77bd0c661.jpeg)
[Screenshot 3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225963033-01cb514d-9518-4e20-9db6-73c6b95798fd.jpeg)


So I ask you to block all of the following domains, due to the fact that they are literally designed to covertly track users...


They track toooooo much information. This is the list of them:

```
Date/Time
IP Address
Country
City
Charging *
Battery*
Orientation
Connection Type *
Timezone *
Language *
Incognito/Private Window *
Ad Blocker *
Local IP *
Screen Size *
Browser
GPU*
Operating System
Bot Name
Referring URL
Device
User Agent
Host Name
Internet Service Provider
VPN/Proxy Detection
Tor Detection
Virtual Machine Detection

```

I believe that collecting such a huge amount of data about users can be used to further phishing or promote malicious spam mailings [(like these cases)](https://www.cnbc.com/2019/06/17/email-sextortion-scams-on-the-rise-says-fbi.html). Please protect your users from such surveillance and block the operation of these domains.

Such a link can also get any extension [(screenshot here)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225965058-4822c416-2f12-4743-803d-67d04c123b86.jpeg), which will allow embedding it into any email, tracking the recipient without his consent.

So I ask you to block following domains:

```
photovault.pics
bathtub.pics
foot.wiki
thisdomainislong.lol
gamergirl.pro
picshost.pics
pichost.pics
gamertag.shop
imghost.pics
imagehost.pics
toldyouso.lol
toldyouso.pics
screenshare.pics
myprivate.pics
noodshare.pics
cheapcinema.club
shhh.lol
dateing.club
shrekis.life -  
headshot.monster
gaming-at-my.best
progaming.monster
yourmy.monster
screenshot.best
gamingfun.me
catsnthing.com
catsnthings.fun
joinmy.site
fortnitechat.site
fortnight.space
stopify.co
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.walmart.com/account/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Faccount%2Flogin) ### Comment Username: @misc-activities > In the Walmart login page (see 0.png), I entered my email address and clicked on the Continue button. It opened a message box trying to show me a "Press and Hold" type CAPTCHA but the CAPTCHA didn't load. This can be seen in 1.png. So, I clicked on "Try a different method" in the message box. When I did that, it showed me a picture identification type CAPTCHA (see 2.png). When I completed the CAPTCHA verification, instead of asking me for the password, it went back to the page where it was asking for my email address and showed a message saying, "Something went wrong, please try again." This can be seen in 3.png. > > I closed the AdGuard app and tried and I was able to login successfully. I also tried with Stealth Mode disabled but that didn't work. > > I'm having this issue in Safari as well. ### Screenshots

Desktop

### Prerequisites

AdGuard DNS

2.1.6

Missed ads or ad leftovers

Safari

Desktop

ifun.de

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

Since a few days, ads are back on various sites like 
ifun.de
sport.sky.de
transfermarkt.de

I haven't changed anything on my end, the issue is also happening on my iPhone.
